alert.note: Alert for Muskegon; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 03 at 8:43PM EDT until September 04 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers may be heavily swamped by waves. * WHERE...Muskegon and Ottawa counties. * WHEN...From this afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds will generate hazardous waves and currents through tonight. The north side of piers will be especially dangerous for swimming. This includes beaches such as Muskegon State Park and Holland State Park.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions and do not venture out on piers. Please check with your local authorities on potential beach closures.
